Name: nya-alhajiyusufmuha
Author: Al Haji Yusuf Muhammad Kanyamula
Source: http://goodwordbooks.com/, Goodword Books, Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa

Translations.Text: Mpikisano wosonkhanitsa chuma cha padziko wakutangwanikitsani inu
Kachiwiri inu mudzauona ndi maso anu
Ndipo patsiku limeneli inu mudzafunsidwa za chisangalalo chimene munali kuchita
